description: <p>Ant Motion 是从蚂蚁金服的&nbsp;<a data-cke-saved-href="https://www.oschina.net/p/ant-design" href="https://www.oschina.net/p/ant-design" target="_blank">Ant Design</a>&nbsp;中提炼出来的动效语言。它不仅仅是动效语言，同时也是一套 React 框架动效解决方案，提供了单项，组合动画，以及整套解决方案，帮助开发者更容易的在项目中使用动效。</p><h4>Ant Motion v1.6.2 更新如下：</h4><ul class=" list-paddingleft-2"><li><p><strong>原则</strong></p></li></ul><p>以自然、高效、克制三大原则为主体。</p><ul class=" list-paddingleft-2"><li><p><strong>速度</strong></p></li></ul><p>以时间与缓动来详细讲解速度的理念。</p><ul class=" list-paddingleft-2"><li><p><strong>空间</strong></p></li></ul><p>将现实空制与动效的结合。</p><ul class=" list-paddingleft-2"><li><p><strong>组合</strong></p></li></ul><p>基本的元素组合与多个元素组合的动效。</p><ul class=" list-paddingleft-2"><li><p><strong>过渡</strong></p></li></ul><p>页面里视图发生变化时所需要的动效。</p><p><strong>下载地址：</strong></p><ul class=" list-paddingleft-2"><li><p><a data-cke-saved-href="https://github.com/ant-design/ant-motion/archive/1.6.2.zip" href="https://github.com/ant-design/ant-motion/archive/1.6.2.zip">Source code(zip)</a></p></li><li><p><a data-cke-saved-href="https://github.com/ant-design/ant-motion/archive/1.6.2.tar.gz" href="https://github.com/ant-design/ant-motion/archive/1.6.2.tar.gz">Source code(tar.gz)</a></p></li></ul>
rss_title: 开源中国社区最新新闻
title: 蚂蚁金服动效语言 Ant Motion 1.6.2，更新动效原则

description: <p>fastjson 1.2.51 已发布，这又是一个 BUG 修复安全加固版本。</p><p><strong>Issues</strong></p><ol class=" list-paddingleft-2"><li><p>修复 1.2.50 引入的 JSONObject.getInt 不支持 float/double 到 int/long 转换的问题；</p></li><li><p>修复 ServiceLoader 捕捉异常不完全的问题；</p></li><li><p>增强对 Jackson 的兼容；</p></li><li><p>fastjson.properties 配置支持 parser.features.NonStringKeyAsString 配置；</p></li><li><p>修复 JSONArray/JSONObject 的 readObject 在 xstream 环境下报错的问题；</p></li><li><p>增强日期格式支持，支持半小时时区和45分钟时区；</p></li><li><p>新增加 joda 日期库的支持，支持DateTime/LocalDate/LocalDateTime/LocalTime/Instant/Period/Duration/DateTimeZone/DateTimeFormatter ；</p></li><li><p>新增 JSONPath.extract 方法，能根据 jsonpath 按需解析 JSON ，大幅提升 json 解析性能，适用于大数据分析场景；</p></li><li><p>增强安全防护。</p></li></ol><p><strong>相关链接</strong></p><ul class=" list-paddingleft-2"><li><p>下载&nbsp;<a data-cke-saved-href="http://repo1.maven.org/maven2/com/alibaba/fastjson/1.2.51/" href="http://repo1.maven.org/maven2/com/alibaba/fastjson/1.2.51/">http://repo1.maven.org/maven2/com/alibaba/fastjson/1.2.51/</a></p></li><li><p>文档&nbsp;<a data-cke-saved-href="https://github.com/alibaba/fastjson/wiki/%E5%B8%B8%E8%A7%81%E9%97%AE%E9%A2%98" href="https://github.com/alibaba/fastjson/wiki/%E5%B8%B8%E8%A7%81%E9%97%AE%E9%A2%98">https://github.com/alibaba/fastjson/wiki/%E5%B8%B8%E8%A7%81%E9%97%AE%E9%A2%98</a></p></li><li><p>源码&nbsp;<a data-cke-saved-href="https://github.com/alibaba/fastjson/tree/1.2.51" href="https://github.com/alibaba/fastjson/tree/1.2.51">https://github.com/alibaba/fastjson/tree/1.2.51</a></p></li></ul>
rss_title: 开源中国社区最新新闻
title: fastjson 1.2.51 发布，Bug 修复安全加固

description: <p>GitLab 为社区版和企业版发布了&nbsp;11.3.1、11.2.4 和&nbsp;11.1.7 安全修复版本。这些版本包含许多重要的安全修复程序，强烈建议立即将所有 GitLab 升级到其中一个版本。</p><p>这些版本包含&nbsp;SSRF GCP 访问令牌暴露、问题详情的持久 XSS 、事件 API 端点中的机密信息暴露等问题的修复。</p><p>关于漏洞的详细信息将在大约30天内在问题跟踪器上公布。</p><p>具体细节请查阅发行说明：</p><p><a href="https://about.gitlab.com/2018/10/01/security-release-gitlab-11-dot-3-dot-1-released/" target="_blank">https://about.gitlab.com/2018/10/01/security-release-gitlab-11-dot-3-dot-1-released/</a></p><p>查看&nbsp;<a href="https://admin.oschina.net/update">update page</a>&nbsp;以了解升级说明。</p>
rss_title: 开源中国社区最新新闻
title: GitLab 发布安全修复版本 11.3.1, 11.2.4 和 11.1.7

description: <p>Audacity 2.3.0 已发布，这是一款跨平台的开源音频编辑器和录制工具，可在 Mac OS X、Microsoft Windows、GNU/Linux 和其它操作系统上运行。</p><p>新版本包含一系列的改进，以及近 90 多项 bug 修复：</p><ul class=" list-paddingleft-2"><li><p><strong>Punch and Roll Recording</strong></p></li><li><p><strong>Playhead &amp; Playback Changes</strong></p></li><li><p><strong>Improved Save Project</strong></p></li></ul><p>Other Changes</p><ul class=" list-paddingleft-2"><li><p>Macros can now be extended or&nbsp;bound to keyboard keys</p></li><li><p>Nyquist gains AUD-DO command</p></li><li><p>Nyquist effects are now translatable and translated</p></li><li><p>More dialogs have help buttons now</p></li><li><p>Increased legibility of trackname display</p></li><li><p>Half-wave option for collapsed tracks</p></li><li><p>Sliding Stretch</p></li><li><p>Dialog (option) for entering labels</p></li></ul><p><a data-cke-saved-href="https://www.omgubuntu.co.uk/2018/10/audacity-2-3-0-released-with-punch-roll-recording-better-save-options" href="https://www.omgubuntu.co.uk/2018/10/audacity-2-3-0-released-with-punch-roll-recording-better-save-options" target="_blank">更多细节可查阅发行说明</a></p><p>下载地址：<a data-cke-saved-href="https://www.audacityteam.org/download/" href="https://www.audacityteam.org/download/" target="_blank">https://www.audacityteam.org/download/</a></p>
rss_title: 开源中国社区最新新闻
title: Audacity 2.3.0 发布，开源音频编辑器和录制工具

description: <p>PMD 6.8.0 已发布，PMD 是一个代码分析器，能够帮助发现常见的编程瑕疵，像是未使用的变量、空的 catch 块、不必要的对象创建等等。最初仅支持 Java 代码，目前还可支持 JavaScript、Salesforce.com Apex 和 Visualforce、PLSQL、Apache Velocity、XML 和 XSL 。</p><p>此次更新主要包括：</p><h4>New Rules</h4><ul class=" list-paddingleft-2"><li><p>The new Apex rule&nbsp;<a data-cke-saved-href="https://pmd.github.io/pmd-6.8.0/pmd_rules_apex_documentation.html#apexdoc" href="https://pmd.github.io/pmd-6.8.0/pmd_rules_apex_documentation.html#apexdoc"><code>ApexDoc</code></a>&nbsp;(<code>apex-documentation</code>)<br/>enforces the inclusion of ApexDoc on classes, interfaces, properties and methods; as well as some<br/>sanity rules for such docs (no missing parameters, parameters&#39; order, and return value). By default,<br/>method overrides and test classes are allowed to not include ApexDoc.</p></li></ul><h4>Modified Rules</h4><ul class=" list-paddingleft-2"><li><p>The rule&nbsp;<a data-cke-saved-href="https://pmd.github.io/pmd-6.8.0/pmd_rules_java_errorprone.html#missingserialversionuid" href="https://pmd.github.io/pmd-6.8.0/pmd_rules_java_errorprone.html#missingserialversionuid"><code>MissingSerialVersionUID</code></a>&nbsp;(<code>java-errorprone</code>) has been modified<br/>in order to recognize also missing&nbsp;<code>serialVersionUID</code>&nbsp;fields in abstract classes, if they are serializable.<br/>Each individual class in the inheritance chain needs an own serialVersionUID field. See also&nbsp;<a data-cke-saved-href="https://stackoverflow.com/questions/893259/should-an-abstract-class-have-a-serialversionuid" href="https://stackoverflow.com/questions/893259/should-an-abstract-class-have-a-serialversionuid">Should an abstract class have a serialVersionUID</a>.<br/>This change might lead to additional violations in existing code bases.</p></li></ul><p><a data-cke-saved-href="https://github.com/pmd/pmd/releases/tag/pmd_releases%2F6.8.0" href="https://github.com/pmd/pmd/releases/tag/pmd_releases%2F6.8.0" target="_blank">更多细节可查阅发行说明</a></p><p>下载地址：</p><ul class=" list-paddingleft-2"><li><p><a data-cke-saved-href="https://github.com/pmd/pmd/releases/download/pmd_releases%2F6.8.0/pmd-bin-6.8.0.zip" href="https://github.com/pmd/pmd/releases/download/pmd_releases%2F6.8.0/pmd-bin-6.8.0.zip">pmd-bin-6.8.0.zip</a></p></li><li><p><a data-cke-saved-href="https://github.com/pmd/pmd/releases/download/pmd_releases%2F6.8.0/pmd-doc-6.8.0.zip" href="https://github.com/pmd/pmd/releases/download/pmd_releases%2F6.8.0/pmd-doc-6.8.0.zip">pmd-doc-6.8.0.zip</a></p></li><li><p><a data-cke-saved-href="https://github.com/pmd/pmd/releases/download/pmd_releases%2F6.8.0/pmd-src-6.8.0.zip" href="https://github.com/pmd/pmd/releases/download/pmd_releases%2F6.8.0/pmd-src-6.8.0.zip">pmd-src-6.8.0.zip</a></p></li><li><p><a data-cke-saved-href="https://github.com/pmd/pmd/archive/pmd_releases/6.8.0.zip" href="https://github.com/pmd/pmd/archive/pmd_releases/6.8.0.zip">Source code(zip)</a></p></li><li><p><a data-cke-saved-href="https://github.com/pmd/pmd/archive/pmd_releases/6.8.0.tar.gz" href="https://github.com/pmd/pmd/archive/pmd_releases/6.8.0.tar.gz">Source code(tar.gz)</a></p></li></ul>

description: <p>FileZilla Client 3.37.3 已发布，包含一些&nbsp;Bug 修复和小改动：</p><ul class=" list-paddingleft-2"><li><p>Fix issues with directory creation when uploading many files in parallel</p></li><li><p>macOS: Fix crashes if dragging more than one file</p></li><li><p>macOS: Opt out of Dark Mode</p></li></ul><p>FileZilla 是一种快速、可信赖的 FTP 客户端以及服务器端开源程序，具有多种特色、直观的接口。</p><p>下载地址&nbsp;<a data-cke-saved-href="https://filezilla-project.org/download.php?type=client" href="https://filezilla-project.org/download.php?type=client" target="_blank">https://filezilla-project.org/download.php?type=client</a></p>

description: <p>Fabric.js 2.4.1 已发布，更新内容如下：</p><ul class=" list-paddingleft-2"><li><p>Fix: Avoid enterEditing if another object is the activeObject&nbsp;<a data-cke-saved-href="https://github.com/fabricjs/fabric.js/pull/5261" href="https://github.com/fabricjs/fabric.js/pull/5261">#5261</a></p></li><li><p>Fix: clipPath enliving for Image fromObject&nbsp;<a data-cke-saved-href="https://github.com/fabricjs/fabric.js/pull/5279" href="https://github.com/fabricjs/fabric.js/pull/5279">#5279</a></p></li><li><p>Fix: toDataURL and canvas clipPath&nbsp;<a data-cke-saved-href="https://github.com/fabricjs/fabric.js/pull/5278" href="https://github.com/fabricjs/fabric.js/pull/5278">#5278</a></p></li><li><p>Fix: early return if no xml is available&nbsp;<a data-cke-saved-href="https://github.com/fabricjs/fabric.js/pull/5263" href="https://github.com/fabricjs/fabric.js/pull/5263">#5263</a></p></li><li><p>Fix: clipPath svg parsing in nodejs&nbsp;<a data-cke-saved-href="https://github.com/fabricjs/fabric.js/pull/5262" href="https://github.com/fabricjs/fabric.js/pull/5262">#5262</a></p></li><li><p>Fix: Avoid running selection logic on mouse up&nbsp;<a data-cke-saved-href="https://github.com/fabricjs/fabric.js/pull/5259" href="https://github.com/fabricjs/fabric.js/pull/5259">#5259</a></p></li><li><p>Fix: fix font size parsing on SVG&nbsp;<a data-cke-saved-href="https://github.com/fabricjs/fabric.js/pull/5258" href="https://github.com/fabricjs/fabric.js/pull/5258">#5258</a></p></li><li><p>Fix: Avoid extra renders on mouseUp/Down&nbsp;<a data-cke-saved-href="https://github.com/fabricjs/fabric.js/pull/5256" href="https://github.com/fabricjs/fabric.js/pull/5256">#5256</a></p></li></ul><p>Fabric.js 是一款简单而强大的 JavaScript Canvas 库，在 HTML5 Canvas 元素之上提供了互动的对象模型，同时还包含&nbsp;Canvas-to-SVG 解析器。</p><p>使用&nbsp;Fabric.js 你可以创建和填充画布上的对象，从简单的几何图形到成百上千路径组成的复杂图形。你可以通过鼠标轻松的移动、缩放和旋转这些对象，修改它们的属性（颜色、透明度，层叠顺序）等等。</p><p><img height="390" data-cke-saved-src="https://static.oschina.net/uploads/space/2017/0227/111305_KWmY_2896879.png" src="https://static.oschina.net/uploads/space/2017/0227/111305_KWmY_2896879.png" width="580"/></p><p>源码下载：</p><ul class=" list-paddingleft-2"><li><p><a data-cke-saved-href="https://github.com/fabricjs/fabric.js/archive/v2.4.1.zip" href="https://github.com/fabricjs/fabric.js/archive/v2.4.1.zip">Source code(zip)</a></p></li><li><p><a data-cke-saved-href="https://github.com/fabricjs/fabric.js/archive/v2.4.1.tar.gz" href="https://github.com/fabricjs/fabric.js/archive/v2.4.1.tar.gz">Source code(tar.gz)</a></p></li></ul>
rss_title: 开源中国社区最新新闻
title: Fabric.js 2.4.1 发布，简易 JavaScript Canvas 库

description: <p>Material UI 3.1.2 已发布，该版本包含许多修复和文档更新。主要更新如下：</p><ul class=" list-paddingleft-2"><li><p>[FormControlLabel] Reverse margins values when labelPlacement=&quot;start&quot; (<a data-cke-saved-href="https://github.com/mui-org/material-ui/pull/13007" href="https://github.com/mui-org/material-ui/pull/13007">#13007</a>)&nbsp;</p></li><li><p>[InputBase] Fix cursor on disabled state (<a data-cke-saved-href="https://github.com/mui-org/material-ui/pull/13008" href="https://github.com/mui-org/material-ui/pull/13008">#13008</a>)</p></li><li><p>[InputLabel] Add&nbsp;<code>variant</code>&nbsp;property to InputLabel type definition (<a data-cke-saved-href="https://github.com/mui-org/material-ui/pull/13009" href="https://github.com/mui-org/material-ui/pull/13009">#13009</a>)</p></li><li><p>[StepLabel] Introduce StepIconComponent property (<a data-cke-saved-href="https://github.com/mui-org/material-ui/pull/13003" href="https://github.com/mui-org/material-ui/pull/13003">#13003</a>)&nbsp;</p></li><li><p>[StepConnector] Customize connector based on internal states (<a data-cke-saved-href="https://github.com/mui-org/material-ui/pull/13023" href="https://github.com/mui-org/material-ui/pull/13023">#13023</a>)&nbsp;</p></li><li><p>[OutlinedInput]&nbsp;<code>notched</code>&nbsp;should be boolean type (<a data-cke-saved-href="https://github.com/mui-org/material-ui/pull/13038" href="https://github.com/mui-org/material-ui/pull/13038">#13038</a>)&nbsp;</p></li><li><p>[TextField] Add &quot;pointerEvents: none&quot; to outline and filled variants (<a data-cke-saved-href="https://github.com/mui-org/material-ui/pull/13040" href="https://github.com/mui-org/material-ui/pull/13040">#13040</a>)&nbsp;</p></li><li><p>[TextField] Fix the recent regressions (<a data-cke-saved-href="https://github.com/mui-org/material-ui/pull/13017" href="https://github.com/mui-org/material-ui/pull/13017">#13017</a>)&nbsp;</p></li><li><p>[Portal] container should allow being &#39;null&#39; type (<a data-cke-saved-href="https://github.com/mui-org/material-ui/pull/13043" href="https://github.com/mui-org/material-ui/pull/13043">#13043</a>)&nbsp;</p></li></ul><p>详情查看<a data-cke-saved-href="https://github.com/mui-org/material-ui/releases/tag/v3.1.2" href="https://github.com/mui-org/material-ui/releases/tag/v3.1.2" target="_blank">发布公告</a>。</p><p>Material UI 是一组实现 Google Material Design 规范的 React 组件，它是一个前端 JS 框架，主要用在 web 领域。</p><p><img height="740" data-cke-saved-src="https://static.oschina.net/uploads/space/2017/0609/113712_NYXE_2896879.png" src="https://static.oschina.net/uploads/space/2017/0609/113712_NYXE_2896879.png" width="1820"/></p><p><img height="310" data-cke-saved-src="https://static.oschina.net/uploads/space/2017/0730/195852_0usI_2896879.png" src="https://static.oschina.net/uploads/space/2017/0730/195852_0usI_2896879.png" width="600"/></p><p>下载地址：</p><ul class=" list-paddingleft-2"><li><p><a data-cke-saved-href="https://github.com/mui-org/material-ui/archive/v3.1.2.zip" href="https://github.com/mui-org/material-ui/archive/v3.1.2.zip">Source code(zip)</a></p></li><li><p><a data-cke-saved-href="https://github.com/mui-org/material-ui/archive/v3.1.2.tar.gz" href="https://github.com/mui-org/material-ui/archive/v3.1.2.tar.gz">Source code(tar.gz)</a></p></li></ul>

title: Material UI 3.1.2 发布，Material Design 开发框架

description: <p><span style="font-family: &quot;PingFang SC&quot;, &quot;Lantinghei SC&quot;, &quot;Helvetica Neue&quot;, Helvetica, Arial, &quot;Microsoft YaHei&quot;, 微软雅黑, STHeitiSC-Light, simsun, 宋体, &quot;WenQuanYi Zen Hei&quot;, &quot;WenQuanYi Micro Hei&quot;, sans-serif;">十一旅游黄金周到来，途家发布的《2018十一出游民宿预测报告》数据显示，2018年十一期间途家民宿订单量相比去年预计增加5倍，其中，TOP10目的地城市的订单量可以占到总订单量的一半以上，二三线城市领跑订单增幅；重庆观音桥、舟山朱家尖成为新晋旅游商圈。</span></p><p><strong><span style="font-family: &quot;PingFang SC&quot;, &quot;Lantinghei SC&quot;, &quot;Helvetica Neue&quot;, Helvetica, Arial, &quot;Microsoft YaHei&quot;, 微软雅黑, STHeitiSC-Light, simsun, 宋体, &quot;WenQuanYi Zen Hei&quot;, &quot;WenQuanYi Micro Hei&quot;, sans-serif;">目的地订单量增幅：二三线旅游城市继续领跑</span></strong></p><p>最受游客欢迎的国内城市中，除北上广一线城市外，成都、重庆、西安、厦门、杭州、青岛、苏州等二三线旅游城市领跑。从受欢迎程度和预定量增长速度上，二三线城市已经超过北上广。这些城市有着丰富的旅游资源，旅游设施和旅游路线完善，预计未来仍将是旅游市场增长的主力。</p><p><img src="https://pic.36krcnd.com/201810/01160207/mnz6o6hpnhplrki4.png!heading" data-img-size-val="865,393"/></p><p><strong><span style="font-family: &quot;PingFang SC&quot;, &quot;Lantinghei SC&quot;, &quot;Helvetica Neue&quot;, Helvetica, Arial, &quot;Microsoft YaHei&quot;, 微软雅黑, STHeitiSC-Light, simsun, 宋体, &quot;WenQuanYi Zen Hei&quot;, &quot;WenQuanYi Micro Hei&quot;, sans-serif;">新晋旅游商圈：重庆观音桥、舟山朱家尖</span></strong></p><p>继网红打卡重庆解放碑商圈民宿后，游客们又挖掘出重庆新的网红商圈——重庆观音桥。重庆观音桥有重庆著名的步行街，大型购物商场云集，是重庆的时尚地标。相比解放碑，观音桥更商业化和年轻化，更受年轻人的追捧和青睐。浙江舟山的朱家尖是国家级风景名胜区，有大青山海岛生态公园、南沙沙雕广场等著名景点，常年PM2.5指数不超过50，受到游客的青睐。其余热门商圈为重庆解放碑、厦门黄厝和曾安厝、长沙五一广场、大理古城、成都春熙路、广州番禺长隆、青岛金沙滩。</p><p><img src="https://pic.36krcnd.com/201810/01160217/oxmhfzzza8errds8.png!heading" data-img-size-val="759,622"/></p><p><strong><span style="font-family: &quot;PingFang SC&quot;, &quot;Lantinghei SC&quot;, &quot;Helvetica Neue&quot;, Helvetica, Arial, &quot;Microsoft YaHei&quot;, 微软雅黑, STHeitiSC-Light, simsun, 宋体, &quot;WenQuanYi Zen Hei&quot;, &quot;WenQuanYi Micro Hei&quot;, sans-serif;">品质民宿需求进一步增长</span></strong><br/></p><p>随着旅游消费的不断升级，国庆黄金周居民出行的住宿需求也更加多元化，特色民宿、品质民宿的需求进一步增长。途家优选民宿和精品民宿的预定量预计比平时增加50%左右。途家优选民宿和民宿分级标准上线之后，房源数量和订单数量都在持续不断上升，游客对对民宿提供的服务、民宿自身的特色和体验需求越来越旺盛，民宿发展逐渐走进品质取胜的新阶段。</p><p><strong>拼假游玩更多样 出现多个入住高峰期</strong></p><p>今年十一长假期间，由于与中秋节相去不远，游客出行的拼假选择更多样，有3+2、4+2、3+3等选择，出现了一长一短、两个短假不同拼游选择，因此出现10月1日、10月2日和10月4日多个入住高峰期。</p><p><strong>80后90后成为民宿消费主力</strong></p><p>随着经济实力增强，80后和部分90后群体开始成为旅游市场的消费主力军，数据显示，十一期间，途家民宿35岁以下的消费者占比接近六成，民宿的多元化、个性化更能满足现代年轻人的旅行追求，年轻游客群体更喜欢在旅行中对当地自然、社会及民俗等特点进行深度了解和体验。</p><p><img src="https://pic.36krcnd.com/201810/01160157/qa8j4pa6t3ip6vci.png!heading" data-img-size-val="639,369"/></p><p><br/></p>
title: ​十一民宿表现：重庆成都受欢迎，品质民宿需求上涨，90后是消费主力
这款诺基亚街机与首款安卓机同年发布，体验远超一代 iPhone
诺贝尔生理学或医学奖获奖名单揭晓，但它似乎遗漏了一位华人科学家 | Global 24/7

description: <p>和平之翼代码生成器SMEU版3.1.1 乌篷船。是和平之翼代码生成器的旗舰分支，Jquery EasyUI, Spring MVC 4, Spring 4, Mybatis 3 技术栈。修正了一些缺陷，经过详尽测试，欢迎使用。</p><p>乌篷船支持华丽的Excel模板代码生成和初始数据导入，软件新增Excel生成界面和示例Excel模板。本版本支持SGS语法加亮的编辑器。本版同时支持MySql/MariaDB和Oracle两种类型的数据库后端。欢迎使用。</p><p>软件码云下载地址：https://gitee.com/jerryshensjf/PeaceWingSMEU。</p><p>软件部分截图：<br/></p><p><img alt="" height="1030" data-cke-saved-src="https://oscimg.oschina.net/oscnet/5dcda9a6168880badadd914bb3ec15f48fb.jpg" src="https://oscimg.oschina.net/oscnet/5dcda9a6168880badadd914bb3ec15f48fb.jpg" width="1920"/></p><p><img alt="" height="1030" data-cke-saved-src="https://oscimg.oschina.net/oscnet/46235b73b084da006c90d599fb55c85f53d.jpg" src="https://oscimg.oschina.net/oscnet/46235b73b084da006c90d599fb55c85f53d.jpg" width="1920"/></p><p>乌篷船：</p><p><img alt="" height="300" data-cke-saved-src="https://oscimg.oschina.net/oscnet/5502205ee6a9fe65be8576a5ec4e79028ef.jpg" src="https://oscimg.oschina.net/oscnet/5502205ee6a9fe65be8576a5ec4e79028ef.jpg" width="340"/></p>
